title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5323.13 - Rules of games notice
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5323.13 - Rules of games notice

State Regulations
(a) A gaming
facility shall to provide notice of the rules under which a particular table
game will operate by posting a sign, or making available other documentation, at such table game advising patrons of the rules in effect at such table
game. (b) Except as provided in
subdivision (c) of this section, a gaming facility may not change the rules
under which a particular table game operates unless the facility submits and
receives approval from the commission in writing in regard to a proposed rules
of game amendment. (c) The
location, size and language of each sign or documentation required by this
section shall be submitted to the commission for review and approval. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5323.13

Adopted

New

York State Register September 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 38, eff. 9/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
